description.@en: A rare few dabble in the darkest of Magicks. In its purest of forms, it is vile and destructive to others and soul-corrupting to the magician that wields it. You force the dark to kneel before you, but only after appropriating a suitable sacrifice.

effect.@en: While Channeling Power, you can voluntarily remove any number of Chaos Dice. However, you suffer 3 additional Corruption for each Chaos Die you remove.
